name: Cave of the Goblin King
description:
Cave of the Goblin King is a multiplayer(3-6) game based on Apprentice, a d20 tabletop RPG system.

Play as the Narrator, or one of five prebuilt characters including a Bard who manipulates luck to help their party, a warlock who uses her blood to empower her spells, or the paladin who can smite or heal her allies with ease.

Recently, the various nearby goblin tribes have united under the banner of a so called "Goblin King" and has been attacking the nearby human village of Meshire. Take up arms and thought against these attacks and uncover what gives the Goblin King his control over the tribes.

This module is meant as a beginners guide to Apprentice. The full rules for Apprentice can be found at ryringames.com, though it is not necessary to play.
